lines.text: Doesn't she fail two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's on a critical. She wasn't attacking Nott specifically. She was attacking the rug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to spend a ki point and do something that I have yet to do, which is Extract Aspects.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It can't have that many hit points, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you hit it twice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I'm going to see if I can catch any reverberations off of the rug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And it makes a what saving throw? Constitution?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Constitution.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is an 11.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What do you want to know about it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to know its damage vulnerabilities. What's it vulnerable to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is actually not vulnerable to anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?! Do I get something else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You learned it is not vulnerable to anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You learned it's badass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to try to pull the rug off of-- We have to out-strength the rug!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Next. Moving on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey guys, Nott's in the rug.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled screaming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's Ulog's turn. Ulog, who sees the rug there, is going to rush over and attempt to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Ulog is a little girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. It was the best I could find in the moment, you know?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not even making an impact on the rug. He is going to use a bonus action to disengage and head back towards where the balcony is. All right. So that goes ahead and ends that. That brings us to the rug's turn. The rug is going to go ahead and release Nott, and is going to attempt to completely envelop Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey guys, Nott's down-- Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's cocked. That is another 16. 21.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, Beau, are now enveloped by the rug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey guys, I think this rug (choking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we defeat this rug before it kills all of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That's going to go ahead and end the rug's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How'd you guys die? A rug.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rugs are the new doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, the rug's going to go ahead, because it can still move-- Well, it's speed is nothing, nevermind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? It moves into the fireplace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well it would move her away. No, it's not going to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't have enough movement to move much. That brings us to the bottom. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I pull the potion of healing I have out of my belt, and I run over to Nott and I jam it into her mouth and pour it in. The whole time I'm going through my list of spells thinking of what could help. There's nothing, but I'm going: Dancing Lights, Fire Bolt, Friends, Alarm, Burning Hands, Chromatic Orb, Comprehend Languages, Detect Magic. And I heal Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for the heal on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And before I got wrapped up I said it's not immune to any-- (choking) It has no weaknesses-- (choking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So how much does Nott heal?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 14 points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From one healing potion?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Greater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Top of the round. Nott, your turn. As you come to consciousness, you are still prone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Return that damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb moved around to join your side there to go ahead and apply the potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't hurt Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will go and try to wrestle the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're a god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (choking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You rush up and you grab it, and it actually lifts you off your feet and you are now being flailed in the air as you're grabbing the edge of the rug, going (screams).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right that ends your turn. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to go help Nott and I'm going to do the same thing. I'm going to try to pry the rug off of Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You move up. Go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the best!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a number.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a number. It's a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of your turn, you suffer ten points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it's crushing your body on the inside and you cannot breathe. It is your turn, though. You can still go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's killing our nostalgia for the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if there's something in the room that will--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Turn it off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Turn it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He would have had to have told me that there was magic anywhere else in the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, because the thing in the fireplace.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, was physical. That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do any type of attack? What can I do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you just have disadvantage on the attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just have disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, you are a badass. You can do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll that fucking shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to try and elbow the fucking shit out this rug.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're the best of all of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am the best!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you, Gil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Terrible, just awful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, did you roll a 20 and an eight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I rolled my damage die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it was an 11?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. Second one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! It's a two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just too tight. You can't quite get any movement to hit it. It's a bad space for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh wait, you said-- oh, disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A 12 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does do sneak attack damage, because you guys are in the vicinity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's doing sneak attack damage to the carpet, which translates to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't know. He's trying to help. That's going to be 12 points of piercing damage, so six to the rug and six to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ouch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's looking fairly hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bits of Beau. Bits of Beau are showing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who wore it best?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the rug's turn. The rug is going to attempt to shift itself and Beau a little bit away this direction. It can only get five feet because its speed is halved pulling you along with it and its speed is ten. So Nott, you get an attack of opportunity, if you want to take one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's looking weak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll swing a shortsword at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You whip out your shortsword quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage with sneak attack. If you want to sneak attack. You don't have to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure. If I'm going to hit it, I'm going to hit it. (counting) 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, all right. That's eight to the rug and seven to Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, she's out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's hanging on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see it still keeps her constrained. You see parts of it are fraying and falling apart. The threads are dangling, but it's still keeping its mass strongly and tightly around her. It's still crushing her and mainly wrapped around her face so she can't see and she can't breathe. That ends the rug's turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What am I doing? I rush forward and I am going to try to pry the rug off of her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Athletics?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Nein

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There it is. You're trying to pull and you get some threads that snap off and you're like "Shit!" It's not working. You're not getting the right grasp on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Caleb's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? What about Jes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's you and then Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that was a reaction. Well, I guess I see how bad the rug is doing and I will swing that shortsword again. Why not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vengeance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to do it with sneak attack, up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said it was hanging by a thread, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like it’s doing pretty rough. It's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe not sneak attack damage. Ooh, ten points? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's five damage to Beau and the rug.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, this rug is expensi--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tear through the rug. You cut through and the rug bisects, but you also see that where you cut through also cut across the front of Beau as her eyes roll back and she plops onto the ground, the rug falling in pieces to the ground around her, coming to rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't let me bleed on it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! What have I done?! Heal her!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will. I cast Cure Wounds on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and cast Cure Wounds to heal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) I didn't bleed on it, did I? I move off the rug so I don't bleed on it.

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: The rug is shredded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going as well as the hospital.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That seems fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to know we were in his room because the rug is messed up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll fix it later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's okay, because if the plan goes according to plan, yeah. Allow myself to introduce myself. If everything goes well, we get Orentha to fall on both of these people at once. So let's finish what we're doing,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Let's gather up the pieces of the rug so it's not, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you gather all the pieces of the rug to join your shingles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scoop up the rug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Check the fucking thing if it's trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check that armoire or whatever it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, check the thing on the ground and see if it's trapped first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check them both.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll check the thing on the ground while Ulog checks the thing on the mantelpiece or wherever it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got a safe and a floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I checking? 14 on the thing on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not appear to be trapped. It does appear to be locked. Roll again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No more magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 15 plus thieves' tools.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, easy enough. (lock clicks) You manage to open it up and there is a small chest about that big that rests in a small cubby beneath.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: What does it have in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you open the chest, make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Son of a gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So first, there's a sudden burst of a brief light through it, and all your muscles tense up and you are paralyzed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Motherfucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. It's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about Ulog?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about Ulog?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because it's simultaneous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ulog goes, "No traps," and pulls it open. No issue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is in there with Ulog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inside with Ulog, you see a beautiful set of burgundy and gold robes that are up hanging, you see a set of polished bracers made of cobalt steel that are both dangling on a hook, and you see three ancient statuettes, like relics or collector's items, that are arranged on the bottom of it that all look like old museum pieces.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they have any symbols on them? On the statues?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All magical, I assume. I assume they're glowing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you still concentrating?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I haven't cast anything that breaks that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None of them are glowing except for the cobalt bracers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I recognize any symbols or see any symbols on the statues?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. You do not, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott just collapsed on the floor, paralyzed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Nott's paralyzed holding onto the chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holding to the chest. The chest which is now open, in Nott's hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am petting Nott's head and going: Don't worry, in the morning, I can take a spell that will heal you, so we'll carry you out here, okay? Everything will be fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull the chest free of Nott's hands. Is this chest glowing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's got the seal in it. Does it have the seal in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the inside there is a faint glow. If you look inside, you see there's a cluster of platinum pieces. They're stacked on the side and have shifted around from the movement. You see a single polished river stone, about that big, that is giving a glowing aura, and you see a few sticks of wax and a single pressed wax seal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I sit down. Oh, do we see his handwriting anywhere? Any letters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not see in this vicinity any letters or handwriting, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. He always gets his squires to do his dirty work. But we have the seal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'll sit down and I'll write a letter really fast that says, "The plan--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's working with the Myriad, and all that stuff earlier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start rooting through Nott's pockets to find the letter in Thieves' Cant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that's different. Those are letters we were leaving here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Thieves' Cant we're leaving here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we should leave them here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we wrote up the letters for the High-Richter too, just so we can stamp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't actually write that letter yet because I was waiting for his handwriting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah we did because we put the Knights of Requital in it. The KR symbol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, why not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From Richter to Sutan we did, so we're leaving those, and we're leaving a note--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, make a perception check. You both make perception checks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nott's fake Myriad note we're leaving here, so I pull that out of Nott's pockets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? You do glance--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. You glance off to the side and there is a desk in the corner that has two sets of drawers that are currently closed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While Jester and Caleb are arguing, Caleb grabs the little magical stone that's in that box and puts it in his pocket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You grab it and put it in your pocket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stuff the letters that we were planting on the High-Richter in the-- sorry, on Sutan into the safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Close the safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay (clicking).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run over to the desk, open the desk, look through it. Do I see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mostly it's just blank parchment. You do see a few notes that are maybe partially written letters that were crumpled up and thrown in there that are Lord Sutan's handwriting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Let me see!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! I look at it and then I sit down and write the letter and go-- okay, what's her name? The High-Richter's letter's first name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Prucine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Prucine! Dayana Prucine!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dayana, okay. I'm going to write: Dayana, got your message, our plan is moving forward exactly as we discussed. The Myriad has our back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. Then sign it Lord Sutan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! And something about the Big-O going down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Big-O will go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tonight, plan happening, sooner than later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll for your forgery kit. So roll a d20, add your proficiency modifier and your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is hard, being outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay. Someone had to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, my intelligence?! Why not wisdom? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there any way I can help her? Like being also proficient in forging in this background and stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. I'll say since you were helping her that I'll give you advantage on the roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage on the roll. So roll one more time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) Ooh, that's so much better! 22!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start making one and it's not quite working out and Beau looks over your shoulder, points it out, you take it--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, you forgot the hooks on the G's!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw it in the fireplace and incinerate that one and then make another one. This one is pretty solid and it matches the writing perfectly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is really good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, yes! It looks amazing. You should be proud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I roll it up, heat up the wax, seal it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (hissing) Done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put the letter in the bag. We have it for later. Then I go and pick up Nott. Let's get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's get the

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've left the Thieves’ Cant note from the "Myriad" and we've left the-- Yeah? Everything that we've planned?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anyone have any books around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the current room? There is a shelf in the hallway that you can see that has a few books.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is anything glowing there though, Matthew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No there's nothing glowing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take out one of the pamphlets for the Traveler and stick it into one of the books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and then I pick up Nott!

You guys are pushed beyond the gates and there's now eight guards at each gate that are preventing any passage in and out. You guys are shoved back out into the city.

There's maybe a three-foot gap between the side of the house, like three or four-foot gap from the side of the house to this. The building is two stories. There is the upper balcony that overlooks the whole exterior of the area before it. There are the two guards at the front.

lines.text: A

lines.text: (breathe deeply)

lines.text: (metal hitting the table)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should take off while he does it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The pain's there. The ones that are closest by would have been you, Caleb; I need you to roll a dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) It was a suicide!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a failure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully a shitty roll for you. That is 21 points of fire damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb goes unconscious onto the ground. As you guys all come to in the moment, you look down at the middle of the staircase: the walls are blackened, the staircase is currently in the process of burning, and down, you see the twisted, gnarled corpses of both Ulog and the High-Richter Prucine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) We have to get out of here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we got to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear (boom).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, help me! We start backing up, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run down, I grab Caleb, and we run out the back door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you head down the stairway, you can see the front door being hit from the opposite side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do me and Molly see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two guards at the bottom go, "Uh!" They quickly throw open the gate and are now currently slamming themselves trying to barricade into the door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the back!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. We're going to start flanking to the back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys are rushing, make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Finally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like (pained sound). It causes your head to-- and you, especially glance over as you begin to surmise the direction, you look past and you can see the Tri-Spires there. In the direction, you see the mighty Zauber Spire, of the Halls of Erudition there in the distance, and you see there this growing, black, spherical mass beginning to emerge from the side of the lower third of the tower. You watch as it expands, the whining gets louder and louder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The attention of the guards suddenly shift over from the banging door to the tower crumbling. You watch as the tower-- suddenly there's a flash of blue light, and the tower stops. You see a brief shift of a force field on the bottom that holds it in place, partially collapsed. You see two figures take off from the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is going on?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are the figures?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's something bigger going on other than us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got to get out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caleb's unconscious; we've got to get him out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't have any spells left!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a healing potion, I'll put it in Caleb's mouth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try and get that back door open and try and get them out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get that door open, you guys start rushing out there, you heal up Caleb. You come to consciousness being dragged, your feet grinding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was doing death saves and it was not going well. Just for shits and giggles! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Alone upstairs, I pick up the scrolls and put them in my pocket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, the house is on fire now. God damn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to open the gable windows, if they open, and jump out them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the windows are shattered, the explosion--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I jump out the windows and scatter as far as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check followed by a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, acrobatics, not great. Ten. Stealth, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you reduce the damage you take by one die, so you only take two points of bludgeoning damage. As you land, your ankle twists, and you tumble and roll and get up. What's your stealth check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using the chaos that way and the guards that are now out in the middle of the street, you land behind them. One of them goes to turn in your direction, and you dart behind the wall, leap over the side and arc around to meet the rest of the party, as you all slowly begin to climb over the back wall, where Beau and Molly are waiting for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got to get out of here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That went so bad!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we were a bigger distraction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think there's something else going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we do this?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we didn't!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Molly, isn't it? Molly did it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We’re running to the sewers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Running to the sewers? Everyone make a stealth check as you're trying to make your way through there. People are now starting to run back to their homes, you can see people running and screaming now, dressed in full attire for the gala, leaving their masks behind, screaming bloody murder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give it to me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bunch of teens and a five!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, that's okay. So a couple of bad rolls, but for the most part, you guys averaged okay. Thankfully with the chaos, and the way you are dressed, you manage to push through and mingle well, it wasn't too hard. You make your way through the town, you can see the tower still being held in place and the two figures that you saw gliding before? As this is happening, and you're rushing through, you see a few other bolts hit, a large bolt of lightning grind down in the distance, before eventually they both begin to peer over and are now looking up and down the streets. As you make your way back towards the alley, over by where the gala is, you see a shadowed figure dart out from behind, and a bolt of lightning strike. There's a detonation of burned ozone as the figure falls to the ground, smoking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go over to the figure, I go over to the figure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk over to the figure, you see one of the flying entities floating down. You can see now this robed mage figure, with a staff in hand, wearing a large ornamental mantle, long grayish hair, is now gliding down in the direction of the dark figure of the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Male or female?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Male.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Steer clear of lightning people!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys see this as you come around--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Age?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The age roughly, from this distance from what you can see, its later. Older age, 70s human, if human, but you can't quite get the details. It starts shouting, "One has fallen. Find the other," and coasts back off, doing a pass, looking through the various streets.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once he's gone, can I wait to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the guards have rushed forwards and grabbed the body and are now dragging it back towards the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that body look like, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money-- (screams in anger). Fucking shit, what is with these fucking rolls! 18. Sorry, sorry, no, that's super wrong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I saw an 8 and I was adding shit! 11, sorry, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you can see is the cloak. The cloak is blocking most of the body, you see a hand behind that's like a leather gauntlet except for fingers exposed. The fingers appear to be-- the glove or design of it are almost like they were dipped in blue. Like there's some sort of a blue tipped glove as its dragged back. That's all the details you can make out, unfortunately, as it's being pulled away off the street. The guards are now swarming, people are trying to get back to their houses. People are swarming the gate out of the Tri-Spire, and the guards are trying to hold them back, calm them down, and it’s nearing a riot at this point. You guys make your way over to the edge of the sewers, begin to look around for a moment where nobody's watching, and one by one make your way down into the darkness, closing it behind you. As you all get down into the quiet of the underground, there's a moment where you can hear the distant muffling of movement. Footsteps, making their way back and forth across the alleyway, other yells and screams, information in the distance, far too far away for you to make out the details of what's being said. What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those men were flying!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those men were super powerful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to get far away from here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to get back to the other side. Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who were they targeting?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were targeting-- I don't know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure they weren't looking for us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I don't think so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was something entirely different.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to go find a shitty place and lay low.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He was in blue, his gauntlets were dipped in blue.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like the Cobalt people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get back to the Leaky Tap. We've seen the power of the Dwendalian Empire. That was more than anything I've ever seen, we've got to get back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never seen someone fly before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Neither have I. Lightning, it turned him almost into ash. Let's get back, we can talk about it when we're in our rooms safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The High-Richter's dead, you guys. That wasn't part of the plan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Ulog too. I think I was sort of mean to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tried to get Ulog to stay and he didn't listen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ulog sacrificed himself. He killed himself and the Richter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, at this point you glance down and you're still clutching, in your fingers--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The stone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the paper that Ulog left behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you guys making your way back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hell yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're heading back through the sewers the direction you came.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are walking away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be aware of the rat balloons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Barely sneaking away from the insanity of the district, you walk through the darkened sewers down the same familiar path that you walked to make your exit, coming up on one of the false junctions, where the left side of it is partially collapsed but the right side continues to where the T-section is. Beauregard, Caleb and Molly and Jester, because you guys all have the higher passive perceptions, you begin to notice this area where there's no water that drains down the centre groove of this part, you see spatters of liquid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look dark?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there's no light in here currently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah. (foomph), Dancing Lights.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dancing Lights open up the area here as you hit the intersection. You see it is dark and red.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is spatters of blood, and as you glance up right there at the intersection, you see a figure, one hand against the wall, breathing heavily. You glance towards it and take a moment as the light globes are now shifting out to light the space. You see a humanoid figure, seemingly male in outline, adorned in jet black, almost insect-like leather armour that protrudes in large sweeping hooks at the joints - the elbow joints, the shoulders. A helmet that's form-fit black leather and onyx studs wraps around their head. It looks demonic, the brow plate sweeping backwards into rear facing horns. Their other hand is dangling, clutching a cannonball-sized, twelve-sided dodecahedron shape, about that big, that has a handle on each side. It's emitting a dull undulating grey glow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I cast Armor of Agathys on myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you cast Armor of Agathys on yourself, the figure, which you now see is the source of the blood, looks heavily wounded and is breathing heavily. The lights now up, its head (creaks) turns towards you and you hear a voice say (guttural speech). Does anybody here speak Undercommon?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Undercommon, anyone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Comprehend Languages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are the components of that one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is verbal, somatic, and material. A pinch of soot of salt which I throw out in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything went to shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It went perfectly, ha!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a Crick!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a Crick?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: People from Xhorhas!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought that was a story.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crick assassins!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Trust the porn!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Trust the porn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Always trust the porn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Edubation! That's why!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should've been more edubated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You would be doing better if you edubated every night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were a few chances for you guys to see High-Richter Prucine arriving, but you kept rolling low perception on the outside--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were fucking balls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and I was like, “All right she's going to get the drop on you guys.” There were so many different ways that could've gone. But it made for an interesting story!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a clusterfuck. That was amazing. You're all terrible people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Edubate once a day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?! The Crick--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh Fjord, it is over. Bromance is over!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cannot wait for this shit! I am in this shit! Finally, I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, that was awesome, well done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Nott took it anyway!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, she did!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's dead. The owner is dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, now! At the moment, though, there's no excuse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't trust people that don't look trustworthy like you, Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course. Doesn't mean they're not shitty selfish ones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are shitty selfish ones.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [no audio] [music]
